DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study explore safety tolerability AZD4547 Japanese patient advance solid malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety Tolerability AZD4547 Japanese Patient
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open-Label , Multicentre Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Preliminary Anti-tumour Activity Ascending Doses AZD4547 Japanese Patients Advanced Solid Malignancies .
DOC.criteria: Japanese patient advance solid malignancy Over 25 year old Relatively good overall health cancer Poor bone marrow function ( produce enough blood cell ) . Poor liver kidney function . Refractory nausea vomiting , chronic gastrointestinal disease , inability swallow IP previous significant bowel resection .
